Photographer: [Photographer's Name] If the photographer's name is not known please indicate IPPA Staff as the Photographer
label: Police investigators are checking for fingerprints of the burglars who ransacked the medical center of Tel Aviv's Hatikva Quarter on Saturday night - apparently looking for drugs.
